content:
skill_id         skill_description                                                                                                           slot
------------------  -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------  --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
bdbe5e86312f4cc2bb  Details the steps to close or block specific ports on a device or network to enhance security.                                 6ba45bf7499f419a8a, e00ba5a0589b4a11be
a95b53f7627442fe9b  Covers the process of establishing a secure connection to a remote network or server through a Virtual Private Network (VPN).  9b732fe9345c432f84, aaa827c8626f408eaa, c2af7b57c698498f99, 546ebdf2f41a4efea4, d30e570196d147678b
aa1cfe0cb4f04b38bb  Covers common issues and solutions for remote access problems, such as difficulty connecting to a remote server or network.    6f92d9d7bfe74afbb9, 39099088e6634b4c99, 0aebe0d3105e4a19b6
09ba2d7e78b24556a1  Explains how to redirect incoming network traffic from one address and port number to another.                                 b4baa44ded7e4e859b, 6fcd28c1e1664e6886, 5b999f2417cd425bb1, fa13dd53f26e46b483, b44deea14e8e45b4b6



entity_id           entity_description                                                                entity_possible_values
------------------  --------------------------------------------------------------------------------  ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
6ba45bf7499f419a8a  The name of the port to be closed.                                                21, 22, 23, 80, 443, 1433
e00ba5a0589b4a11be  The protocol used by the port.
9b732fe9345c432f84  The type of VPN connection to establish.
aaa827c8626f408eaa  The address of the VPN server.                                                    vpn.example.com, 192.168.1.1, vpn.company.com
c2af7b57c698498f99  The username for VPN authentication.
546ebdf2f41a4efea4  The password for VPN authentication.
d30e570196d147678b  The protocol to use for the VPN connection.
6f92d9d7bfe74afbb9  The device that is having trouble connecting remotely.                            computer, phone, tablet, smart TV
39099088e6634b4c99  The type of remote access being used.
0aebe0d3105e4a19b6  The error message displayed when the connection fails.                            Cannot connect to server, Authentication failed, Connection timed out, Network error
b4baa44ded7e4e859b  The protocol used for the port forwarding, either TCP or UDP.                     TCP, UDP
6fcd28c1e1664e6886  The number of the port to be forwarded.
5b999f2417cd425bb1  The name of the device to which the port forwarding rule will apply.
fa13dd53f26e46b483  The internal IP address of the device where the forwarded port will be directed.
b44deea14e8e45b4b6  A brief description of the port forwarding rule.                                  , FTP server, Web server, Email server
